text:
@WhiteHouse ”Why does the U.S. represent 4% of the world popupation,

But 28% of the World's deaths from Coronavirus?

Is the U.S. Medical system 7 times worse than the World average,

Or is someone in America manipulating numbers?” 

John McAfee
